GENTLE & NON INVASIVE: NoseFrida SnotSucker nasal aspirator for baby ensures comfort by creating a seal with the exterior of the baby's nostril, allowing for gentle and effective suction without intrusion.
HYGIENIC DESIGN: Disposable filters effectively trap snot in the barrel, maintaining a hygienic environment. It is recommended to replace the filter after each use for optimal cleanliness.
SAFE FOR NEWBORNS & TODDLERS: Specifically designed for babies and toddlers aged 0 and up, NoseFrida helps clear stubborn snot, promoting easy breathing for little ones.
EASY TO CLEAN: The blue nasal tube, red mouthpiece, and filter cap are dishwasher safe on the top rack for convenient cleaning. The long, clear tube can be cleaned with 70% isopropyl alcohol for thorough hygiene.
EVERYTHING YOU NEED: Each NoseFrida comes with 1 device and 24 hygiene filters, providing a comprehensive solution for effective and safe nasal suction for your baby. Pair with our Frida Baby Saline Nasal Spray (sold separately) for ease of removing those stubborn boogers.
FSA / HSA ELIGIBLE: This item qualifies for FSA/HSA reimbursement

```bash

from PIL import Image
import os

# å¤„ç† dr-talbots-aspirator.png
input_path = 'images/original/dr-talbots-aspirator.png'
output_webp = 'images/webp/dr-talbots-aspirator.webp'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºWebP
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    img.save(output_webp, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
    print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {output_webp}')
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆå“åº”å¼å°ºå¯¸
    sizes = [
        (300, 300, '300x300'),
        (400, 400, '400x400'), 
        (600, 600, '600x600')
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/dr-talbots-aspirator_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path}')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ dr-talbots-aspirator å›¾ç‰‡å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!')
else:
    print('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶')
```

```bash
python -c "
from PIL import Image
import os

# å¤„ç† growsy-electric-aspirator.png
input_path = 'images/original/growsy-electric-aspirator.png'
output_webp = 'images/webp/growsy-electric-aspirator.webp'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºWebP
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    img.save(output_webp, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
    print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {output_webp}')
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆå“åº”å¼å°ºå¯¸
    sizes = [
        (300, 300, '300x300'),
        (400, 400, '400x400'), 
        (600, 600, '600x600')
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/growsy-electric-aspirator_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path}')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ growsy-electric-aspirator å›¾ç‰‡å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!')
else:
    print('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶')
```

```bash
python -c "
from PIL import Image
import os

input_path = 'images/original/growsy-electric-aspirator.png'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    
    # åˆ é™¤æ—§çš„å“åº”å¼å›¾ç‰‡
    old_files = [
        'images/responsive/growsy-electric-aspirator_300x300.webp',
        'images/responsive/growsy-electric-aspirator_400x400.webp',
        'images/responsive/growsy-electric-aspirator_600x600.webp'
    ]
    
    for file in old_files:
        if os.path.exists(file):
            os.remove(file)
            print(f'âœ… å·²åˆ é™¤: {file}')
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å“åº”å¼å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ˆä¿æŒ1.33:1æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼‰
    sizes = [
        (300, 225, '300x225'),  # 1.33:1
        (400, 300, '400x300'),  # 1.33:1
        (600, 450, '600x450')   # 1.33:1
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/growsy-electric-aspirator_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path} (æ¯”ä¾‹: {width/height:.2f}:1)')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ GROWNSYå“åº”å¼å›¾ç‰‡é‡æ–°ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ!')
else:
    print('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶')
"
```

```bash
python -c "
from PIL import Image
import os

input_path = 'images/original/comparison-chart.png'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å“åº”å¼å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ˆä¿æŒ1.33:1æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼‰
    sizes = [
        (800, 600, '800x600'),    # 1.33:1
        (1200, 900, '1200x900'),  # 1.33:1
        (1600, 1200, '1600x1200') # 1.33:1
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/comparison-chart_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path} (æ¯”ä¾‹: {width/height:.2f}:1)')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ æ–°comparison-chartå“åº”å¼å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ!')
else:
    print('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶')
"
```

```diff
+         margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
+         font-size: 1.1rem;
+     }
+     
+     .recommendation p {
+         margin: 0;
+         font-size: 1rem;
+     }
+     
+     .error-message {
+         color: #ef4444;
+         text-align: center;
+         padding: 1rem;
+         background: #fef2f2;
+         border: 1px solid #fecaca;
+         border-radius: 8px;
+     }
+     
+     @media (max-width: 768px) {
+         .comparison-cards {
+             grid-template-columns: 1fr;
+             gap: 1rem;
+         }
      }
      
```

```bash

from PIL import Image
import os

# å¤„ç†æ–°çš„logo.png
input_path = 'images/original/logo.png'
output_webp = 'images/webp/logo.webp'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºWebP
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    img.save(output_webp, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
    print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {output_webp}')
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆå“åº”å¼å°ºå¯¸
    sizes = [
        (100, 100, '100x100'),
        (150, 150, '150x150'),
        (200, 200, '200x200'),
        (300, 300, '300x300')
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/logo_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path}')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ æ–°logoå¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!')
else:
    print('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶')
"
```

```bash

import os

# å¤„ç†about-team.png
input_path = 'images/original/about-team.png'
output_webp = 'images/webp/about-team.webp'

if os.path.exists(input_path):
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºWebP
    img = Image.open(input_path)
    img.save(output_webp, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
    print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {output_webp}')
    
    # ç”Ÿæˆå“åº”å¼å°ºå¯¸
    sizes = [
        (400, 300, '400x300'),
        (600, 450, '600x450'),
        (800, 600, '800x600')
    ]
    
    for width, height, suffix in sizes:
        resized = img.resize((width, height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
        webp_path = f'images/responsive/about-team_{suffix}.webp'
        resized.save(webp_path, 'WebP', quality=85, optimize=True)
        print(f'âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ: {webp_path}')
        
    print('ğŸ‰ about-teamå›¾ç‰‡å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!')
else:
```

```diff
@@ -471,4 +472,93 @@
  `;
  document.head.appendChild(style);
- document.head.appendChild(style);
+ 
+ // Affiliate Conversion Tracking
+ function initializeAffiliateTracking() {
+     // Track Amazon affiliate link clicks
+     const amazonLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="amazon.com"]');
+     
+     amazonLinks.forEach(link => {
+         link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             const productName = getProductNameFromLink(this);
+             const productPrice = getProductPriceFromContext(this);
+             
+             // Google Analytics 4 Event
+             if (typeof gtag !== 'undefined') {
+                 gtag('event', 'affiliate_click', {
+                     'event_category': 'Affiliate',
+                     'event_label': productName,
+                     'value': productPrice,
+                     'currency': 'USD',
+                     'custom_parameter_1': 'Amazon'
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             // Google Tag Manager DataLayer
+             if (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined') {
+                 dataLayer.push({
+                     'event': 'affiliate_click',
+                     'product_name': productName,
+                     'product_price': productPrice,
+                     'affiliate_platform': 'Amazon',
+                     'currency': 'USD'
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             // Microsoft Clarity Event
+             if (typeof clarity !== 'undefined') {
+                 clarity('event', 'affiliate_click');
+             }
+             
+             console.log('Affiliate click tracked:', productName, productPrice);
+         });
+     });
+ }
+ 
+ // Helper function to extract product name from Amazon link
+ function getProductNameFromLink(link) {
+     const href = link.href;
+     const url = new URL(href);
+     const pathname = url.pathname;
+     
+     // Extract product name from URL path
+     if (pathname.includes('/dp/')) {
+         const dpIndex = pathname.indexOf('/dp/');
+         const productId = pathname.substring(dpIndex + 4, dpIndex + 14);
+         
+         // Map product IDs to product names
+         const productMap = {
+             'B01787L6QY': 'NavÃ¤ge Nasal Care Starter Kit',
+             'B000RDZFZ0': 'NeilMed Sinus Rinse Kit',
+             'B00RP0GHBO': 'NoseFrida Baby Saline Kit',
+             'B01N093BYV': 'Frida Baby Aspirator',
+             'B08CMWHD3B': 'GROWNSY Electric Nasal Aspirator',
+             'B0BSVG8RGR': 'Dr. Talbot\'s Silicone Nasal Aspirator'
+         };
+         
+         return productMap[productId] || 'Unknown Product';
+     }
+     
+     return 'Amazon Product';
+ }
+ 
+ // Helper function to extract product price from context
+ function getProductPriceFromContext(link) {
+     // Try to find price in the same product card
+     const productCard = link.closest('.product-card, .review-card, .team-member');
+     if (productCard) {
+         const priceElement = productCard.querySelector('.current-price, .price');
+         if (priceElement) {
+             const priceText = priceElement.textContent;
+             const price = parseFloat(priceText.replace(/[^0-9.]/g, ''));
+             return price || 0;
+         }
+     }
+     
+     return 0;
+ }
+ 
+ // Initialize affiliate tracking when DOM is loaded
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+     initializeAffiliateTracking();
+ });
```
